ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Best Melee Race/Class
ygData.msgSnippet: kit up So obvious... I could tell half way through. ... From: Nygaard, Jeff [mailto:jeff.nygaard@goodrich.com] Sent: Tuesday, August 07, 2001 8:42 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
" kit up"

So obvious... I could tell half way through.

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaard, Jeff [mailto:jeff.nygaard@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 07, 2001 8:42 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Best Melee Race/Class


I would give Iskar Shadow Knight a try. This race and class combo has a lot
of pluses and I think you would like it Denis. You get natural AC bonus,
regen bonus, forge your own food and drinks, you don't have the "bad" class
penalty as before. Shadow Knights can bring a lot of fire power to a group
and you are sort of self-sufficient.

I would like to give a shadow knight a try, but I am not going to make any
new characters for a while. Once I make level 60, I'll help getting my
brother to level 60 and then about that time it will be time for the
expansion to come out. My brother and I will make one character of the new
race, can't remember name, but it is the cat-like PC. Well both take a week
of vacation and power level it heck out of it and hope to be level 50+ by
the end of the week. Then we'll do /guildinvite <PL Cat PC> and then laugh
at the guild when they ask who is soandso? Hehe, Power Leveling, still some
of the most fun I get out of EQ.

Just have fun and kit up!
Jeff


-----Original Message-----
From: Amy Williams [SMTP:amy_e_williams@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 07, 2001 12:42 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Best Melee Race/Class

try a dark elf shadow knight....I'm having a lot of fun with mine :)
